SodanNaiyo: Saikin, yakan hinyou no tame suimin ga samatagerareteimasu.
CareMngSodanNaiyo: Yakan no idouni yoru futan oyobi tentou risuku o keigen suru tame, beddo saido e no po-taruburu toire no secchi o kentou shimasu.

AdlList.ServicePlanNaiyo: Yakan wa 2~3 jikan oki ni nyou i ga ari, tsudo okiagatte hai nyou suru hitsuyou ga arimasu.
Yakan no hinkai na kakusei ni yori nichuu ni tsuyoi nemuke ga mirareru, katsudouryou ga teika shiteimasu.
Yakan hinyou ni yoru suimin fusoku ga manseika shiteori, hiroukan no zoukyou ga mitomeraremasu.

FamilyKosei: Gokourei no haiguusha to doukyo sareteimasu.
TokkiJiko: Po-taruburu toire oyobi kyūshū paddo o shiyou shiteimasu ga, yakan ni okeru houmon kango ni yoru keizokuteki na kansatsu oyobi fukuyaku shidou ga hitsuyou na joukyou desu.
HonninKimochiNaiyo: Yakan ni nando mo me ga sameru koto ni yoru suimin fusoku ni taishite fuman o kanjite orare, nichuu no darusa ni taishite mo iradachi ga mirareru yousu desu. Mata, kaigo o ninau okusama e no futan o shinpai sarete iru kanousei mo kangaeraremasu.
HonninLifeMind: Tsuma mo kourei nanode, watashi no yakan no kaijo de tsuma no suimin ga samatagerareru no ga moushiwakenai. Tsuma ga anshin shite nemureru you ni, nanika taisaku o mitsuketai.
FamilyLifeMind: Yakan no mimamori ya haisetsu kaijo no futan ga keigen sareru koto o negatte ori, yakan saabisu no katsuyou ya haisetsu kea ni oite kufuu o toriirete itadaku koto de, fuufu tomoni anshin shite yakan o sugoseru you ni shite hoshii
ShienPlan: Yakan no hinyou ni yoru suimin shougai ni taishi, houmon kango ni yoru seikatsu shidou to fukuyaku kanri o tettei suru. Po-taruburu toire to kyūmizu paddo no shiyou joukyou o kakunin shi, yori kaiteki na haisetsu kea o mosaku suru. Gohonnin no fuman to, kaigosha de aru tsuma no hirou ni hairyo shi, yakan no haisetsu kaijo no futan keigen saku (rei: neru mae no suibun seigen, haisetsu rizumu no chousei) o kazoku to kyouryoku shite kentou・jisshi suru.
